author: Michael Ryan
comment: Cannot change faces on Gear S2.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Hello Michael. 
If you are Gear user you'll have to download the individual watchfaces from Samsung Galaxy store. Google Play individual watchfaces are for Android wear users only. Hope this answers your question, if not please contact us via email (ask.watchmaster@gmail.com) and we will be happy to help you out. 
Thank you and best regards.

author: Dan Lightbody
comment: Stopped working after a couple of days "unfortunately caster has stopped" error msg all the time, I want my money back!!!
